item.title: By: tighr10
item.dc:creator: tighr10
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/01/24/beginning-our-20th-year/#comment-1278">middlebassgal</a>.
The membership form and pages about joining can be found at tighr.net see MEMBERSHIP FORM Open to worldwide interest in spreading friendship through fiber ... hope to welcome you on our private members' site and maybe at the next Tri-Ennial in Victoria
item.content:encoded:
In reply to middlebassgal.

The membership form and pages about joining can be found at tighr.net see MEMBERSHIP FORM Open to worldwide interest in spreading friendship through fiber … hope to welcome you on our private members’ site and maybe at the next Tri-Ennial in Victoria

item.title: By: middlebassgal

item.description: how do I join? I live in Ohio! I am a atha member
